definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: I only watch when there's western on.
sentences.chinese: 只有演西部片的時候我纔看。

sentences.english: She had him cast in her Western movie The Quick and the Dead.
sentences.chinese: 她請他在她的西部片《致命快槍手》中扮演角色。

sentences.english: I saw a lot of movies, and especially liked the westerns.
sentences.chinese: 我看了許多部電影，尤其喜歡西部片。

sentences.english: The whole market has a Wild West feel.
sentences.chinese: 整個超市行業有點西部片的感覺。

sentences.english: The Western re-invented itself in the revisionist Western.
sentences.chinese: 在修正主義西部片中，西部電影完成了自我改造。

sentences.english: Elements of western movies can be found also in some movies belonging essentially to other genres.
sentences.chinese: 西部片元素也可以從其它類型片當中找到。

sentences.english: Some recent Westerns give women more powerful roles.
sentences.chinese: 一些新近的西部片塑造了更強有力的女性角色。

sentences.english: I think there's a Western on.
sentences.chinese: 我想播的是一部西部片。

pinyin: Zheng3 jiu4 Da4 bing1 Rui4 en1

definition: Brokeback Mountain, 2005 English-language film by Ang Lee 李安[Li3 An1]

pinyin: Kun1 ting1 · Ta3 lun2 di4 nuo4
